99407.name: Collieries (tonnes)
99407.description: The quantity of coal production allocated to energy use in UK collieries.
99407.datasetName: Coal by use in the UK (BEIS, 2018)
99407.s_name: Coal by use in the UK (BEIS, 2018)

source.name: Coal by use in the UK (BEIS, 2018)
source.dataPublishedBy: Department for Business, Energy & Industrial Strategy
source.additionalInfo:
Coal use in the UK over the long-term, categorised by its end use (e.g. electricity, railways, domestic). This is measured in million tonnes.

Data is sourced from 'Historical coal data: coal production, availability and consumption 1853 to 2017', published in the Digest of United Kingdom Energy Statistics (DUKES).
